鮹鮹鮹

鮹字的基本解释

鮹
shāo
烟管鱼，一种体细长、呈亚圆筒形的海鱼。亦称“马鞭鱼”。

鮹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāo］
［《廣韻》所交切，平肴，生。］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
鱼名。
[②]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
通“綃1”。

鮹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮹； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1470第19
【廣韻】所交切【集韻】師交切，?音梢。海魚，形如鞭鞘。【本草】鮹魚，腹似馬鞭，尾有兩岐如鞭鞘，故名爲鮹。出江湖。又【廣韻】相邀切【集韻】思邀切，?音宵。義同。

鮹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鮹字的起名意思

暂无。

Ibis
Basic explanation of words
Ibis
shāo
Pipefish, a slender, sub-cylindrical marine fish. Also known as "Verbage".
Ibis
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāo]
["Guangyun" cross cut, flat food, raw. ]
["Guangyun" invites each other, calm night, heart. ]
The name of the fish.
[②]［xiāo］
["Guangyun" invites each other, calm night, heart. ]
Pass "绡1".
Ibis
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮹; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1470 Page 19
[Guangyun] Intersecting with each other [Jiyun] Intersecting with the teacher, the sound tip. Marine fish, shaped like a whip sheath. 【Materia Medica】Ibis, its belly is like a whip, and its tail is like a scabbard, so it is called ibis. Out of the arena. And [Guang Yun] Inviting to cut [Ji Yun] Inviting to cut,? Yin Xiao. The same meaning.

an octopus, devilfish
